program: Bachelor of Social Sciences in Interdisciplinary Studies
option: With Minor from Faculty of Social Sciences
notes: Minors offered by the Faculty of Social Sciences: Anthropology (ANT), Criminology (CRM), Conflicts Studies and Human Rights (ECH), Economics (ECO), Feminist and Gender Studies (FEM), Public Administration (PAP), Political Science (POL), Psychology (PSY), Sociology (SOC), Social Work (SVS â€“ only offered in French).
Please verify the course requirements of the selected minor.
A second minor may be added to this program. The 30 course units from the second minor would replace 30 units from the 42 elective course units.

Fall: 3 compulsory 1000 level courses from selected minor
Winter: 3 compulsory and/or optional 1000 level courses from selected minor
